summary: 2007 LEXUS RX 350.  CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO VEHICLE SUDDEN ACCELERATION.  *LD  THE CONSUMER STATED THE VEHICLE SURGED FORWARD THROUGH 2 SMALL TREES. THE ENGINE HAD TO BE TURNED OFF BEFORE THE VEHICLE WOULD STOP. THE CONSUMER GAVE AUTHORIZATIONS FOR THE MANUFACTURER TO INSPECT THE VEHICLE.   UPDATED 07/06/2017*JS  ..UPDATED 08/30/17 *BF  *JS
